SiteNameAddress: 72 Purley Rise, Purley on Thames
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
Notes: The site is included as an allocation within the adopted Housing Site Allocations Development Plan Document (HSA DPD). Whilst the site is used mainly for open storage of caravans, there are two workshops which are permanent structures. The classification of the land as previously developed or greenfield will depend on the extent the curtilage of the permanent structures. It is unclear whether the land used for storage of caravans is within the curtilage of the workshops, and for that reason the site was classified and assessed as a mix of previously developed and greenfield in the Sustainability Appraisal of the HSA DPD
